copy: Martin Richard Foundation is hosting a clean-up day with the Ashmont-Adams Neighborhood Association.
The Museum of Science will offer free admission from 4pm-7pm on a first come, first served basis.
The Franklin Park Zoo is hosting a sock drive to benefit Bay Cove Human Services.
City of Boston Veterans Services is delivering service packages and spending time with veterans.
ArtBar Cambridge will donate a portion of the day's proceeds to the Sean A. Collier Self Scholarship Fund.
American Red Cross and Sheraton Boston are hosting a blood drive.
Blaze Pizza is offering free pizza to all first responders at all three of their Back Bay locations.
Royal Sonesta Boston is collecting donations of infant necessities to benefit the East End House.
